con:interface.name: Swagger API Definition - Campaign Domain - v2
con:interface.con:description: Provides API Services for the integration of Campaign Endpoints (v2) Home

con:part.con:content: swagger: '2.0' info: version: v2 title: Swagger API Definition - Campaign Domain - v2 description: | Provides API Services for the integration of Campaign Endpoints (v2) Home host: oemil.volkswagen.de basePath: /services schemes: - https produces: - application/json - application/problem+json parameters: oemil-client-app: name: oemil-client-app in: header description: > Predefined indicator for the application that is calling the OEM.IL. Needs to correspond to an entry in the OEM.IL internal list of valid client applications. Please ask OEM.IL Support for oemil-client-app - single application: \ - platform application: \_\ The security gateway will extract the client-application from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a application value in the token and this http header, then the http header will override the token's application value, i.e. an existing "oemil-client-app" header will always be looped through to the API implementation. examples - VWConnect, CoVa, WCDP_ORU, WCDP_PDM required: true type: string x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-trace-id: name: oemil-trace-id in: header description: > Client generated UUID string which has been uniquely created for that request. Can be used for problem analysis in case of errors. required: true type: string maxLength: 255 x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-client-brand: name: oemil-client-brand in: header description: > The brand value of the OEM manufacturer to which the OEM.IL client belongs to. Expected to be a valid value as specified in the code list CL00441. If the client's brand is already part of the security token, that he brings, then this header is allowed to be omitted from the request. The security gateway will extract the brand from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a brand value in the token and this http header, the token's brand value will override the http header. #Brand derived from code list - CL00441 Brand (all brands inside and outside VW Group). Brand could be a part of the security token. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string x-code-list: CL00441 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.3 x-parameter-model: true oemil-client-country: name: oemil-client-country in: header description: > The country where the OEM.IL client is located. Expected as alpha-2 code of ISO3166-1. If the client's country is already part of the security token, that he brings, then this header is allowed to be omitted from the request. The security gateway will extract the country from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a country value in the token and this http header, the token's country value will override the http header. type: string required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-lee-country: name: oemil-lee-country in: header description: > Country in which the legal entity (LEE) is located according to ISO 3166, ALPHA-2-code, e.g. "CN" for China. If a CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute is mandatory. If no CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute will be ignored. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true oemil-lee-name: name: oemil-lee-name in: header description: > Code of the legal entity (LEE), e.g. Volkswagen Group has the legal entity code "000100". This means that in this example, the value of the attribute "oemil-lee-name" needs to be set to "000100". For example, all WCDP clients in Europe need to transmit this legal entity code. If a CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute is mandatory. If no CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute will be ignored. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true oemil-api-version: name: oemil-api-version in: header description: > This header parameter describes the version of the OEM.IL API. The endpoint paths do not contain the service version at all. The parameter substitutes the versioning path parameter. The host and base path of the endpoints do not change and the sourcing will be managed by the "oemil-api-version" header. Please note that this header only references to the OEM.IL release version. type: string required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true accept-language: name: accept-language in: header description: > Multi-part string identifier for a language according to IETF RFC4646 (e.g. de, de-DE, de-Latn-DE, de-Latn-DE-1996). The OEM.IL falls back to its own default language when the requested language is unavailable. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true Authorization: name: Authorization in: header description: Bearer Authorization Token type: string maxLength: 1024 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true vin: name: vin in: path description: Unique vehicle identification number of the OEM type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true securityDefinitions: bearer: name: Authorization description: >- The Bearer authentication scheme was originally created as part of OAuth 2.0 in RFC 6750. type: apiKey in: header responses: '400': description: > Bad Request - The 400 (Bad Request) status code indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing). schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '401': description: > The 401 (Unauthorized) status code indicates that the request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '403': description: > Forbidden - The 403 (Forbidden) status code indicates that the server understood the request but refuses to authorize it. The server that wishes to make public why the request has been forbidden will describe that reason in the response payload. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '404': description: > Not Found - The 404 (Not Found) status code indicates that the origin server did not find a current representation for the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists. A 404 status code does not indicate whether this lack of representation is temporary or permanent. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '408': description: > The 408 (Request Timeout) status code indicates that the server did not receive a complete request message within the time that it was prepared to wait. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '429': description: > Too Many Requests - The 429 (Too Many Requests) status code indicates that the resource has been exhausted, perhaps a per-user quota, or perhaps the entire file system is out of space. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '501': description: > The 501 (Not Implemented) status code indicates that the server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '503': description: "The 503 (Service Unavailable) status code indicates that the server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overload or scheduled maintenance, which will likely be alleviated after some\_delay.\n" schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' default: description: > Internal server error - The 500 (Internal Server Error) status code indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' paths: /campaigns/selections: post: description: Creates a response of multiple campaign data based on filter criteria. tags: - 'Z:in_preparation' operationId: create_campaigns_selections_ov2 consumes: - application/json produces: - application/json - application/problem+json externalDocs: description: At the following address the returned status codes are given. url: >- https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/campaigns/selections/index.html parameters: - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-app' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-trace-id' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-brand' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-country' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-lee-country' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-lee-name' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-api-version' - $ref: '#/parameters/Authorization' - name: campaign_filter description: >- This campaign_filter is optional. If no filter is set, the default filter options will be chosen automatically. in: body schema: $ref: '#/definitions/campaign_filter_ov2' required: false responses: '200': description: The campaign data has been returned successfully. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/campaigns_ov2' '400': $ref: '#/responses/400' '401': $ref: '#/responses/401' '403': $ref: '#/responses/403' '408': $ref: '#/responses/408' '429': $ref: '#/responses/429' '500': $ref: '#/responses/default' '501': $ref: '#/responses/501' '503': $ref: '#/responses/503' x-unitTests: [] x-operation-settings: CollectParameters: false AllowDynamicQueryParameters: false AllowDynamicFormParameters: false IsMultiContentStreaming: false x-auth-type: Application & Application User x-throttling-tier: Unlimited x-endpoint-version: 2 x-endpoint-logic: true /campaigns: post: description: Updates the campaign based on the vehicle identification number. tags: - Campaign operationId: return_campaign_ids_ov2 produces: - application/json - application/problem+json externalDocs: description: At the following address the returned status codes are given. url: >- https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/campaigns/campaign-ids/index.html parameters: - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-app' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-trace-id' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-brand' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-country' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-lee-country' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-lee-name' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-api-version' - $ref: '#/parameters/Authorization' - name: import_date_from in: query description: > Search pattern for minimum value for a specific range to query campaign IDs that have been imported from this date according to RFC3339. Specify the corresponding maximum value for attribute import_date_until to complete the search interval, e.g. "2015-06-28T14:07:17Z". If no search pattern is defined, then all campaign IDs and their import date of the last 7 days are returned per default. The attributes "import_date_from" and "import_date_until" are connected to each other via logical AND operator. type: string format: date-time required: false - name: import_date_until in: query description: > Search pattern for minimum value for a specific range to query campaign IDs that have been imported until this date according to RFC3339. Specify the corresponding minimum value for attribute import_date_from to complete the search interval, e.g. "2015-06-28T14:07:17Z". If no search pattern is defined, then all campaign IDs and their import date of the last 7 days are returned per default. The attributes "import_date_from" and "import_date_until" are connected to each other via logical AND operator. type: string format: date-time required: false responses: '200': description: >- The campaign IDs and related import dates have been returned successfully. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/campaign_keys_ov2' '400': $ref: '#/responses/400' '401': $ref: '#/responses/401' '403': $ref: '#/responses/403' '408': $ref: '#/responses/408' '429': $ref: '#/responses/429' '500': $ref: '#/responses/default' '501': $ref: '#/responses/501' '503': $ref: '#/responses/503' x-unitTests: [] x-operation-settings: CollectParameters: false AllowDynamicQueryParameters: false AllowDynamicFormParameters: false IsMultiContentStreaming: false x-auth-type: Application & Application User x-throttling-tier: Unlimited x-endpoint-version: 2 x-endpoint-logic: true /campaigns/ecus/documentation: post: description: >- Creates a request to update the campaign info (like status) and ecu definitions for a defined vehicle (VIN) . tags: - Specify the corresponding maximum value for attribute import_date_until to complete the search interval, e.g. "2021-02-28T14:07:17Z". If no search pattern is defined, then all change measures and their import dates of the last 7 days are returned per default. If no import_date_from is given, then import_date_from is set to current timestamp minus 7 days by default. If the import_date_from is greater than the import_date_until or if the import_date_until is less than the import_date_from, then an empty list will be returned. The attributes "import_date_from" and "import_date_until" are connected to each other via logical AND operator. type: string format: date-time required: false - name: import_date_until in: query description: > Search pattern for maximum value for a specific range to query change measures that have been imported until this date according to RFC3339. If no import_date_until is given or if the import_date_until is greater than the allowed value (current timestamp), then the import_date_until is set to current timestamp by default. If the import_date_until is less than the import_date_from or if the import_date_from is greater than the import_date_until, then an empty list will be returned. description of the criterion. type: string maxLength: 4096 example: CriterionDescriptionSample vehicle_information_list: description: List of vehicle information objects. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/campaign_vehicle_information_ov1' x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true error_code_ov1_2: title: error_code description: Definition of the response error type: object properties: type: description: >- Identifies the problem type (e.g. URI) - additional information of the http error type: string example: 'https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/index.html' title: description: Short message that describes the error type: string maxLength: 255 status: description: Http status codes of the error type: number format: int16 minimum: 100 maximum: 600 detail: description: Specific explanation of the occurred problem. type: string maxLength: 255 oem_error_code: description: >- Code of the fault. It is the technical identifier for a type of faults. type: string maxLength: 4 oem_error_description: type: string description: Written description of the fault. maxLength: 4096 required: - type - title - status - detail x-object-version: 1.2 x-object-model: true affected_ecu_ov2: title: affected_ecu description: Checklist relevant information about the source and target ecu type: object properties: order: description: > Order of the flash files. Each flash container is in a separate checklist line. This attribute defines the order of all single flash container for an ECU. This attribute is currently not supported by OEM system and will be reworked as soon as a solution is provided. Therefore, as a temporary solution, this attribute will be set to "1" per default. type: integer default: 1 example: 1 source_sg_version_id: title: sg_version_id description: Identifier of the ECU type: string example: 10473278 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true target_sg_version_id: title: sg_version_id description: Identifier of the ECU type: string example: 10473278 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true target_flash_container_id: description: >- Defined ID for the flashcontainer for the corresponding target ECU version (Document-ID) type: string example: 10481907 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true after_sales_service_action_ov2: title: after_sales_service_action description: >- Contains information related to a after-sales service action (in German "Kundendienstmanahme") type: object properties: id: description: >- ID of the after-sales service action (in German "Kundendienstmanahme") type: integer example: 99 name: description: >- Name of the after-sales service action (in German "Kundendienstmanahme") type: string example: ESC B9 HBC Bewarnung 1.4TFSI (Limo/Avant) change_date: description: >- Change date of the after-sales service action (in German "Kundendienstmanahme") type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17.000Z' brand_code: title: brand_code description: > Brand of the dealer - CL00003 BrandCode CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 1 example: 'N' x-code-list: >- CL00003 BrandCode Describes a brand within the Volkswagen Group. Abbreviation is used because the codes are common within the group. x-object-version: 1.5 x-object-model: true deprecated_status: description: >- Determines, whether the after-sales service action (in German "Kundendienstmanahme") is deprecated or not type: boolean example: false x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true after_sales_service_actions_ov2: title: after_sales_service_actions type: object properties: after_sales_service_actions: description: List of after-sales service actions type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/after_sales_service_action_ov2' required: - after_sales_service_actions x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true assigned_ecu_change_measure_ov2: title: assigned_ecu_change_measure description: 'Object, which contains several change measure data.' type: object properties: measure_ref: description: 'Object, which contains an Identifier (ID) of change measure.' type: object properties: change_measure_id: description: Identifier (ID) of change measure. type: string maxLength: 45 example: 2714878 measure_code: description: Code of change measure. type: string maxLength: 255 example: '35E6' measure_description: description: Description of change measure. type: string maxLength: 4096 example: Test MBB Export 4KE model_year_range: description: > Object, which contains a start and end year for filtering based on model years. In case start and end year are given, all model years in between including the start and end year are affected. In case neither start nor end year is given, all model years are affected. In case only the start year is given, all subsequent model years including the start year are affected. In case only the end year is given, all previous model years including the end year are affected. type: object properties: start_year: description: Start year for filtering based on model years. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 2007 end_year: description: End year for filtering based on model years. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 2007 brand_code: description: Brand code of change measure. type: string maxLength: 1 example: A model_codes: description: List of model codes. type: array items: description: 'Object, which contains a model code.' type: object properties: model_code: description: > (Technical) code of the model of the changes measure. Determines the German term "Modellbeschreibung Technik (MBT)". type: string example: 4KE ota_description: description: Over The Air (OTA) description of change measure. type: string maxLength: 4096 example: Test AM-Export MBB f. 4KE status: description: Status of change measure. type: string example: Testing update_medium_part_number: description: Part number of the flash/update medium of change measure. type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD target_baselines: description: List of target baselines. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/target_baseline_ov2' target_ecus: description: List of target Electronic Control Units (ECUs). type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/target_ecu_ov2' infotainment_update: description: 'Object, which contains information for infotainment updates.' type: object properties: update_id: description: Update identifier (ID) for infotainment updates. type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD document_id: description: Document identifier (ID) for infotainment updates. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 10880886 group_problem_management_ids: description: List of group problem management identifiers (IDs). type: array items: description: 'Object, which contains a group problem management identifier (ID).' type: object properties: group_problem_management_id: description: >- The Group problem management identifier (ID) defines the functional reference to a group problem management operation or change measure. type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD campaign_ids: description: List of campaign identifiers (IDs). type: array items: description: 'Object, which contains a campaign identifier (ID).' type: object properties: campaign_id: description: Campaign identifier (ID) of change measure. type: string maxLength: 255 example: VB01 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true campaign_ov2: title: campaign description: This object contains the provided campaign data from ReCall. type: object properties: campaign_id: description: This attribute determines an unique identifier for the campaign. type: string maxLength: 4 example: U001 selected_countries: description: This array determines a list of selected countries. type: array items: description: This object determines a selected country. type: object properties: country_code: description: >- This attribute determines the country code according to ISO-3166-Alpha-3. type: string maxLength: 3 example: NED campaign_start_time: description: This attribute determines the starting date for the campaign. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17.000Z' country_campaign_status: description: >- This attribute determines the status oft he campaign for this specific country. type: string maxLength: 1 example: I excluded_countries: description: >- This array determines a list of countries according to ISO-3166-Alpha-3, which are excluded by ReCall. type: array items: type: string maxLength: 3 example: DEU campaign_criteria: description: This array determines a list of criteria for the campaign. type: array items: description: This object determines a criteria for the campaign. type: object properties: criterion: description: >- Determines a grouping level for underlying campaigns, e.g. criteria 01 means frist enrollment of remote update, criteria 02 means second enrollment of remote update, etc. type: string maxLength: 2 example: 1 title_language: description: >- This attribute determines the language for the criterion according to IETF language tag. type: string maxLength: 5 example: de-DE title: description: >- This attribute determines a german text from EC04. If the German text is not available, then the English text is derived. type: string maxLength: 60 example: This is a title oru_relevant: description: >- Determines wether a specific criterion of a campaign is ORU relevant or not type: boolean vehicles: description: >- This array determines a list of vehicle objects, which are valid for this specific criterion. type: array items: description: >- This object determines a vehicle object, which is valid for this specific criterion. type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true oru_relevant: description: >- Determines wether a specific vehicle of a criterion is ORU relevant or not type: boolean mbv_model_code: description: >- This attribute determines the modell description sales. Determines the german term "Modellbeschreibung Vertrieb (MBV)". type: string maxLength: 6 example: CR74RJ mbt_model_code: description: >- This attribute determines the model description technical. Determines the german term "Modellbeschreibung Technik (MBT)". type: string maxLength: 4 example: 10A brand_code: description: > Brand of the dealer (CL00003 BrandCode Describes a brand within the Volkswagen Group) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 1 example: V pkn: description: >- This attribute determines the german term Produktionskennnummer. type: string maxLength: 13 example: 0479001662009 vehicle_update_status: description: This attribute determines the vehicle update status. type: string example: Done_by_dealership delivering_dealer: description: >- This attribute determines one of the the dealer numbers of a vehicle. type: string maxLength: 11 example: DEU12432590 supervising _dealer: description: >- This attribute determines one of the the dealer numbers of a vehicle. type: string maxLength: 11 example: DEU12432590 ordering_dealer: description: >- This attribute determines one of the the dealer numbers of a vehicle. type: string maxLength: 11 example: DEU12432590 equipment_codes: description: >- This array determines a list of trim levels of the vehicle. type: array items: description: This attribute determines the trim level of the vehicle. type: string example: 1KD model_year: description: This attribute determines the year of the model. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 2006 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true campaign_documentation_status_ov2: title: campaign_documentation_status description: Contains the documentation status according to the processing ID. type: object properties: processing_id: description: >- ID of the process as Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation according to RFC4122. type: string format: uuid example: 550e8400-e29b-11d4-a716-446655440000 processing_status: description: >- Current status of the process as enumeration of the values "OPEN", "IN_PROGRESS", "DONE" and "FAILED" type: string enum: - OPEN - IN_PROGRESS - DONE - FAILED vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true campaign_documentation_status: description: >- Contains the documentation status for campaigns according to the processing ID. type: object properties: campaign_kind: description: Kind of the campaign. type: string maxLength: 255 example: recall campaign_id: description: OEM internal identification of the campaign. type: string maxLength: 255 example: VB09 acknowledgement: description: >- Acknowledgement, which determines whether the documentation has been executed successfully by the corresponding OEM system or not. True, if the documentation has been executed successfully, else false. If the documentation failed, then fault parameters by OEM system are returned as well. type: boolean example: true fault: description: Contains error descriptions in case of an error. type: object properties: system: description: >- System, which recognized the fault according to CL00015. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string maxLength: 10 example: RCL class: description: >- Class of the fault, which determines the responsible party for fault handling according to CL00267. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string maxLength: 10 example: technical code: description: >- Code of the fault, which determines the technical identifier for a type of faults. type: string maxLength: 4 example: '9026' level: description: >- Level of the fault, which determines the severity of the fault and indicated level of recovery to be done according to CL00268. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 1 example: W id: description: >- ID of the fault, which is generated by the fault system. The fault ID is mandatory for error level and optional for information. Additionally, the fault ID is used by the support to find further information in the system logs. type: string maxLength: 100 example: 6e26c196-a7b5-408f-865d-3a7cfbeec562 detection_date: description: Date of detection of the fault. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17Z' code_details: description: List of parameters of the fault code details. type: array items: description: Parameter of the fault code details. type: object properties: parameter_name: description: Name of the parameter of the fault code details. type: string maxLength: 100 example: '9026' parameter_value: description: Value of the parameter of the fault code details. type: string maxLength: 100 example: Technical validation error system_details: description: List of parameters of the fault system details. type: array items: description: Parameter of the fault system details. type: object properties: parameter_name: description: >- Name of the parameter of the fault system details according to CL00269. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string maxLength: 100 example: Application parameter_value: description: Value of the parameter of the fault system details. type: string maxLength: 100 example: CSP-IA-GW@WSGWCPNQ2-WOB reason: description: >- Reason of the fault, which may be used for nested fault conditions. type: string maxLength: 255 example: XML not schema valid x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true campaign_ecus_ov2: title: campaign_ecus description: >- Contains campaign and vehicle configuration data to update documentation in corresponding OEM systems. type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true campaign: description: >- Contains campaign data to update documentation in corresponding OEM system. type: object properties: completion_status: description: Resulting status of the campaign for the vehicle. type: string example: DONE_BY_ORU campaign_id: description: OEM internal identification of the campaign type: string maxLength: 255 example: VB09 criterion_id: description: Identification of selection criterion. type: string maxLength: 255 example: '01' reparation_time: description: Date of repair. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17.000Z' required: - completion_status - campaign_id - criterion_id vehicle_ecus: description: >- Contains vehicle configuration data to update documentation in corresponding OEM system. type: object properties: ecu_update: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_update_ov2' required: - ecu_update required: - vin x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true campaign_filter_ov2: title: campaign_filter description: >- This object contains various filters, which are applied on campaign response. type: object properties: campaign_ids: description: >- This filter determines a filter, which is applied on the "Aktionsnummer". Only data related to the the defined campaign IDs shall be returned. If no filter is set, this filter shall not be evaluated and nothing shall be filtered out (the data of all campaigns are returned). type: array items: type: string maxLength: 4 example: AB12 criteria: description: >- This filter determines a filter, which is applied on the "criterion". Only data related to the the defined campaign IDs shall be returned. If no filter is set, this filter shall not be evaluated and nothing shall be filtered out (the data of all all criterions are returned). type: array items: type: string maxLength: 2 example: 1 campaign_status: description: >- This filter determines a list of elements, which are applied on the requested campaign status data. In case of -value, all active campaigns are returned. In case of I-value, all inactive campaigns are returned. In case of L-value, campaigns which are deleted soon, are returned. In case of of A-value to be archived soon. Thereby, multiple values are allowed. Default value for campaign_status is all campaigns ,I,L,A if no value is defined. type: array items: type: string maxLength: 1 example: I oru_relevance: description: >- This filter determines a list of elements, which are applied on the requested criteria data. In case of value "RELEVANT", all criteria, which are Online Remote Update (ORU) relevant, are returned. In case of value "NOT_RELEVANT", all those criteria, which are not ORU relevant, are returned. Thereby, multiple values are allowed. Default value for criteria is "ALL" if no value is defined. type: string enum: - ALL - RELEVANT - NOT_RELEVANT example: ALL vehicle_relevance: description: >- This filter determines a list of elements, which are applied on the vehicle data. In case of value "RELEVANT", all criteria, which are Online Remote Update (ORU) relevant, are returned. In case of value "NOT_RELEVANT", all those criteria, which are not ORU relevant, are returned. Thereby, multiple values are allowed. Default value for criteria is "ALL" and if no value is defined. type: string enum: - ALL - RELEVANT - NOT_RELEVANT example: ALL brands: description: >- This filter determines a list of elements, which allow CDS to get only data from selected brands. Default is all Brands. type: array items: description: > This attribute defines a filter, which allows CDS to get only data from selected brands. Default ist all Brands. - CL00003 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: A x-code-list: CL00003 excluded_countries: description: >- This filter determines if the response should contain all VINs or only VINs from counties which are not on the excluded countries list. The value true means "filtering of excluded VINs", the value false means "no filtering". The default value is "false". type: boolean example: false x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true campaign_keys_ov2: title: campaign_keys description: 'Key, which contains a combination of campaign ID and import date.' type: object properties: campaign_keys: description: List of campaign keys type: array items: description: 'Key, which contains a combination of campaign ID and import date.' The WholesalerNumber is stored in the Group Importer System KVPS as BID. type: string maxLength: 3 example: '444' base_sw_version: description: >- Version of the tester's base software, which is needed for the support in error cases. type: string maxLength: 255 example: '1.9' diagnostic_sw_version: description: >- Version of the tester's diagnostic software, which is needed for the support in error cases. type: string maxLength: 255 example: '1.9' brand_code: description: > Brand of the Vehicle according to CL00003, * e.g. code value "V" for description "VW PKW" * e.g. code value "N" for description "VW Nutzfahrzeuge" Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Use left-hand zeros if necessary. maxLength: 4 example: 005F master_related_diagnostic_adress: type: string description: >- Master related Electronic Control Unit (ECU) address as 4-digit hexadecimal code. Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Note that the listed examples may not be up-to-date. Please refer always to the newest codelist. example: Slave required: - diagnostic_address ecu_part_number: type: string description: Spare part number of hardware. maxLength: 18 example: 282005491149392400 hw_part_number: type: string description: Spare part number of electronic part number. maxLength: 18 example: 1A2345678B hw_version: type: string description: Version string of the hardware as 3-digit code. maxLength: 255 example: Z05 sw_version: type: string description: Version string of the software as 4-digit code. maxLength: 255 example: XB01 component_check_code: type: string description: >- Identification string of some technical component parameters to enable checking of vehicles tuning activities. maxLength: 8192 process_parameter: type: object properties: just_flashed: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether a update has been processed within this repair (triggered by a previous request). supports_flash: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indictates, whether the Electronic Control Unit (ECU) is flashable or not. True, if the ECU is flashable, otherwise false. just_coded: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether a coding has been processed within this repair (triggered by a previous request). just_parametrized: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether a parametrizing has been processed within this repair (triggered by a previous request). flash_always: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether the Electronic Control Unit (ECU) must be flashed only when a delta exisits by comparing actual versus target. True, only in case of a delta, otherwise false. repair_time: type: string format: date-time example: '1985-04-12T23:20:50.52Z' description: >- Repair time. Only time is relevant - date will be set to null. just_software_configured: type: boolean example: false description: 'True, if just configured, otherwise false.' just_swap_activated: type: boolean example: false description: 'True, if just swap activated, otherwise false.' just_adjust_calibrated: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether the calibration has been adjusted within this repair (triggered by a previous request). just_calibration_proofed: type: boolean example: false description: >- True, if calibration was executed but without deviation, otherwise false. asam_data: type: object properties: asam_file_identifier: type: string description: ASAM data file identifier. maxLength: 255 asam_file_version: type: string maxLength: 9 description: ASAM file version. required: - asam_file_identifier - asam_file_version required: - diagnostic_information - ecu_part_number - hw_part_number - hw_version - sw_version - process_parameter required: - user_id - tester_information - process_information - vehicle_information - ecu_information x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true processing_id_ov2: title: processing_id description: 'Contains a processing information, which can be used for status request' type: object properties: processing_id: title: processing_id description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation. OEM.IL will always create an individual processing_id which will also be used for later feedback. type: string format: uuid example: 550e8400-e29b-11d4-a716-446655440000 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true paging_campaign_change_records_ov2: title: paging_campaign_change_records description: Paged list of change records related to a campaign. type: object properties: campaign_change_records: description: List of change records related to a campaign. type: array items: description: Change record related to a campaign. type: object properties: campaign_id: description: Unique identifier for the campaign. type: string maxLength: 4 example: VB01 import_date: description: >- Date of import according to RFC3339, which is generated within OEM.IL each time when a new update on a campaign is imported. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-06-28T14:07:17.000Z' brand_codes: description: > Selected brands for the campaign (CL00003 BrandCode describes a brand within the Volkswagen Group) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: array items: type: string example: - V - 'N' title: description: Title of the campaign type: string example: ORU Test campaign 01 title_language: description: Language of the campaign title type: string example: de-DE creation_date: description: Date of the campaign creation type: string format: date-time example: '2015-07-28T14:07:17.000Z' selected_countries: description: List of selected countries for the campaign. type: array items: description: Selected country for the campaign. type: object properties: country_code: description: >- Country code of the campaign according to ISO-3166-Alpha-3. type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 3 example: NED start_date: description: Start date of the campaign according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17.000Z' status: description: > Status of the campaign as enumeration with the following values: * " " as empty string means that the campaign is active. * "I" means that the campaign is inactive. * "L" means that the campaign is going to be deleted soon. * "A" means that the campaign is going to be archived soon. type: string enum: - ' ' - A - I - L excluded_countries: description: >- List of excluded countries for the campaign according to ISO-3166-Alpha-3. type: array items: description: >- Excluded country for the campaign according to ISO-3166-Alpha-3. type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 3 example: - ARG - CHL - ECU campaign_criteria: description: List of criteria related to the campaign. type: array items: description: Criteria related to the campaign. type: object properties: criterion: description: > Grouping level for underlying campaigns, * e.g. criteria "01" means first enrollment of remote update, * e.g. criteria "02" means second enrollment of remote update, * etc. type: string maxLength: 2 example: '02' creation_date: description: Date of the criterion creation type: string format: date-time example: '2015-07-28T14:07:17.000Z' title_language: description: >- Code to identify human language for the criterion according to IETF language tag. type: string maxLength: 5 example: de-DE title: description: >- German title for the criterion from EC04. If the German title is not available, then the English title is derived. type: string maxLength: 60 example: OEM.IL KRITERIUM 02 oru_relevant: description: >- Determines, whether a specific criterion of a campaign is relevant for Online Remote Update (ORU) or not. type: boolean example: true offset: description: > Offset (start pointer) of campaigns returned. Start Pointer (paging) is depending on attribute "limit". If no value is defined, then value is set to 0 per default. The minimum value is defined as 0. type: integer default: 0 minimum: 0 example: 0 limit: description: > Maximum number of campaigns returned in the response at once. If no value is defined, then value is set to 20 per default. The minimum value is defined as 10. If the total amount of returned campaigns is less than 10, then the minimum value is not applied. The maximum value is defined as 50. type: integer default: 20 minimum: 10 maximum: 50 example: 20 total: description: 'Total number of available campaigns, which are returned.' type: integer example: 208 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true paging_criterion_vehicles_ov2: title: paging_criterion_vehicles description: >- Paged list of vehicles related to a campaign, an import date and a criterion. type: object properties: campaign_id: description: Unique identifier of the campaign. type: string maxLength: 4 example: VB01 import_date: description: >- Date of import according to RFC3339, which is generated within OEM.IL each time when a new update on a campaign is imported. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17Z' criterion: description: | Grouping level for underlying campaigns, * e.g. criteria "01" means first enrollment of remote update, * e.g. criteria "02" means second enrollment of remote update, * etc. type: string maxLength: 2 example: '02' vehicles: description: >- List of vehicles related to a campaign, an import date and a criterion. type: array items: description: 'Vehicle related to a campaign, an import date and a criterion.' type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true oru_relevant: description: >- Determines, whether a specific criterion of a campaign is relevant for Online Remote Update (ORU) or not. type: boolean example: 'true' oru_relevant_date: description: Creation date of ORU relevant type: string format: date-time example: '2015-07-28T14:07:17.000Z' mbv_model_code: description: >- Code of model according to CL00027 defined by "Modellbeschreibung Vertrieb (MBV)". This code represents a selling code of the Volkswagen (VW) Group. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls. type: string maxLength: 6 example: CR74RJ mbt_model_code: description: >- This attribute determines the model description technical. Determines the german term "Modellbeschreibung Technik (MBT)". type: string maxLength: 4 example: 10A brand_code: description: >- Brand of the dealer according to CL00003. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls. type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 1 example: V pkn: description: Production identifier. In German Produktionskennnummer. type: string maxLength: 13 example: 0479001662009 update_status: description: > Update status of the vehicle as enumeration with the following values: * " " An empty values means that no status is available for this vehicle * "CUSTOMER_NOTIFIED" means that the customer was informed about the campaign for his vehicle via HMI. * "DONE_BY_ORU" means" that the campaign was implemented successfully via Online Remote Update (ORU). * "DONE_BY_DEALERSHIP" means that the Online Remote Update (ORU) recognized that the vehicle already reached its target state. Consequently, there is a high probability that a dealer already implemented the campaign. type: string enum: - ' ' - CUSTOMER_NOTIFIED - DONE_BY_ORU - DONE_BY_DEALERSHIP delivering_dealer: description: 'Dealer, which delivers the vehicle.' type: string maxLength: 11 example: CHN75813756 supervising_dealer: description: 'Dealer, which supervizes the vehicle.' type: string maxLength: 11 example: CHN79601076 ordering_dealer: description: 'Dealer, which orders the vehicle.' type: string maxLength: 11 example: CHN79601061 equipment_codes: description: List of equipment codes. type: array items: description: >- Equipment code according to several CodeLists like PR Number (CL00364), Package Number, Maneck Code. The code is usually manufacturer dependent. Can be used for technical equipment (CL00324), interior equipment (CL00322) and exterior equipment (CL00323). CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls. type: string example: - AV1 - B0A - BLB model_year: description: Year of the model. type: string maxLength: 4 example: '2006' model_name: description: Name of the vehicle model type: string example: Golf V6 4Motion creation_date: description: Date of vehicle data creation type: string format: date-time example: '2015-07-28T14:07:17.000Z' offset: description: > Offset (start pointer) of vehicles returned. Start Pointer (paging) is depending on attribute "limit". If no value is defined, then value is set to 0 per default. The minimum value is defined as 0. type: integer default: 0 minimum: 0 example: 0 limit: description: > Maximum number of vehicles returned in the response at once. If no value is defined, then value is set to 2000 per default. The minimum value is defined as 1000. If the total amount of returned vehicles is less than 1000, then the minimum value is not applied. The maximum value is defined as 5000. type: integer default: 2000 minimum: 1000 maximum: 5000 example: 2000 total: description: 'Total number of available vehicles, which are returned.' type: integer
